entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers beginning early this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of showers near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
